text: Miranpur is a town located in the Punjab province of Pakistan. It is located in Lahore District at 31°17'0N 73°7'0E with an altitude of 172 metres (567 feet) and lies near to the city of Lahore.Location of Miranpur - Falling Rain Genomics Neighbouring settlements include Kot Guraya to the south, Khushipur to the east and Bilochwala to the west. ==References== Category:Populated places in Lahore District
title: Miranpur, Punjab
